content.raw:
My guess is that it has to do with changes in the prereleases and I agree, it's out of the scope of this PR.

> To mitigate the impact of the first case, I've filtered the indirect DART dependencies installed by libignition-physics-dartsim-dev and force the packaging to upgrade all them:

Great! That should help with accidentally having two different versions of dart installed.
content.html:
My guess is that it has to do with changes in the prereleases and I agree, it's out of the scope of this PR.

To mitigate the impact of the first case, I've filtered the indirect DART dependencies installed by libignition-physics-dartsim-dev and force the packaging to upgrade all them:

Great! That should help with accidentally having two different versions of dart installed.
